citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
Required documentation, such as the program of veterinary care, avian enrichment plan, contingency plan, and record of
animals on hand, were not available at the time of inspection. The records ensure that the licensee is accountable for
compliance with the Animal Welfare Act. The facility must ensure that these records are available for review at the time of
inspection.
Correct by 11/25/23
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
Required documentation, such as the program of veterinary care, avian enrichment plan, contingency plan, and record of 
animals on hand, were not available at the time of inspection. The records ensure that the licensee is accountable for 
compliance with the Animal Welfare Act. The facility must ensure that these records are available for review at the time of 
inspection. 
 
Correct by 11/25/23 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
